desc: Homemade soy wax melts with long Lasting Scent. We use only high quality soy wax and the best fragrance oils, which gives a long lasting scent throw. This scent is everything! Premium luxury wax melts & candles that can fill any room with the refreshing scents you love. Buy 2 get 1 Free.

layout.text: Luxury Handmade wax melts & candles from 100% soy wax
